short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for filling up employees' attendance for You-Source

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides a quick access to the YS Attendance Form.

This boosts the employee's productivity since it allows them to fill up their attendance logs while being able to browse through their sprint board or other tools that contains the list of their tasks.

With the help of this extension, we expect the employees to never miss out on their attendance logs.
